data.description:
**FOR INDIVIDUAL AND EVALUATION USE ONLY - Educational and other institutions please contact us for licensing information** 

Built by leading scientists and educators, 10k Science offers a world-class science education for every student. From discovering a CRISPR treatment for sickle cell disease to investigating the microscopic insect anatomy of an invasive species, 10k Science seamlessly adapts to diverse educational uses with its advanced, intuitive technology and state-of-the-art instructional design.

An AI-powered teacherâ€™s assistant guides students with live audio interactions and responds verbally, in real-time. Designed to help teachers evaluate student learning and provide critical feedback, the web-based dashboard monitors student progression and gives insight into the student thought process. Future enhancement aims to empower parents with greater control over usage, potentially rewarding students with additional VR screen time as they progress through their lessons. 

10k Science features a growing library of inquiry-driven content from researchers at Cambridge, UC Berkeley, UC Davis, and others, with alignment to the Next Generation Science Standards by Lawrence Hall of Science.
